column2: this time for my birthday.  The second time was just as wonderful as the first.  We went for happy hour on a Monday and arrived at 5:30.  The restaurant was nearly empty.  Happy hour ends at 6:30
column3: so we had plenty of time to drink and peruse the menu before ordering.  The waiter gave us great recommendations on portions
column4: as well as the daily specials.  Their raw items are so fresh and tasty.  I do think their pork belly products (roll and appetizer) could both use some improvement.
